Package org.jivesoftware.smack.util.dns

Interface Summary
DNSResolver Implementations of this interface define a class that is capable of resolving DNS addresses.
 

Class Summary
DNSJavaResolver This implementation uses the dnsjava implementation for resolving DNS addresses.
HostAddress  
JavaxResolver A DNS resolver (mostly for SRV records), which makes use of the API provided in the javax.* namespace.
SRVRecord
